The symptoms have nothing to do with HIV. Stop thinking that you have HIV if you do and consult a doctor for all your symptoms.

question: hii had protected sex (vaginal + oral)  with a call girl more than 6months ago..she put on me what i believe was a latex condom ....had intercourse oral + vaginal then i masturbated and ejaculated inside condom .... it did not leak ...however some of her ''liquids'' might have come on my hand by doing that >?at 2 months i noticed my groin was swollen a bit ...not sure lymph node coz its more of a bulge than pea shaped swell.....hasnt gone down till now...doesnt hurt much ....infact i only see it when im lying down ....at 4 months i had tingling feet for about 1 week .....no diabetes... i dont think injuryAT 6 months i started having constant what i reckon is diarrhea ...hasnt subsided yet ( more than 1 month)....i am of excellent fitness and food intakehowever , type 6 on bristol scale here  :  http://farm3.static.flickr.com/2300/2170596147_62580196b9.jpgtested blood test a 3 months  ....the doctor said said shed do a ''full blood count ?????''came back negativebut i live in a 3rd world country ...i did another blood test (not HIV related)White blood cells came back higher than normal ...I had night sweat yesterday, im over tired and sleep 9 hrs a day :(im over stressed and fell mentally exhausted.....never fever .....please help,im scared to get a 6 months test .....
title: dildo factory
